subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The left post stopped one shot. The crossbar stopped another. Martin Brodeur took care of nearly all the rest, putting the Devils into first place in the Eastern Conference for the first time since 2001.
snippet: The left post stopped one shot. The crossbar stopped another. Martin Brodeur took care of nearly all the rest, putting the Devils into first place in the Eastern Conference for the first time since 2001.
